nodes.documentation: @dev This emits when funds are reassigned
nodes.name: FundsReassigned

nodes.documentation: @dev This emits when funds are revoked
nodes.name: FundsRevoked

nodes.documentation: @dev This emits when an address is frozen
nodes.name: FundsFrozen
reassign
revoke

nodes.documentation: @dev getter to determine if address is in frozenlist
nodes.name: frozenlist
addAddressToFrozenlist
removeAddressFromFrozenlist

nodes.documentation: @dev getter to determine if address is in whitelist
nodes.name: whitelist
addAddressToWhitelist
removeAddressFromWhitelist
addIssuer
removeIssuer
transferIssuer

addAddressToFrozenlist(address).details: add an address to the frozenlist this operation can be performmed only by an Issuer.
addAddressToFrozenlist(address).return: true if the address was added to the frozenlist, false if the address was already in the frozenlist

addAddressToWhitelist(address).details: add an address to the whitelist this operation can be performmed only by an Issuer.
addAddressToWhitelist(address).return: true if the address was added to the whitelist, false if the address was already in the whitelist

addIssuer(address).details: add a new issuer address this operation can be performmed only by the contract Owner.
addIssuer(address).return: true if the address was not an issuer, false if the address was already an issuer

frozenlist(address).details: getter to determine if address is in frozenlist

reassign(address,address).details: Transfer tokens from a specified address to another one this operation can be performmed only by an Issuer.

params._from: The address from which the tokens are withdrawn
params._to: The address that receives the tokens

reassign(address,address).return: true if the tokens are transferred

removeAddressFromFrozenlist(address).details: remove an address from the frozenlist this operation can be performmed only by an Issuer.
removeAddressFromFrozenlist(address).return: true if the address was removed from the frozenlist, false if the address wasn't in the frozenlist in the first place

removeAddressFromWhitelist(address).details: remove an address from the whitelist this operation can be performmed only by an Issuer.
removeAddressFromWhitelist(address).return: true if the address was removed from the whitelist, false if the address wasn't in the whitelist in the first place

removeIssuer(address).details: remove an address from issuers this operation can be performmed only by the contract Owner.
removeIssuer(address).return: true if the address has been removed from issuers, false if the address wasn't in the issuer list in the first place

revoke(address).details: Transfer tokens from a specified address to the contract owner (issuer) this operation can be performmed only by an Issuer.

params._from: The address from which the tokens are withdrawn

revoke(address).return: true if the tokens are transferred

transferIssuer(address).details: Allows the current issuer to transfer his role to a newIssuer. this operation can be performmed only by an Issuer.

params._newIssuer: The address to transfer the issuer role to.

whitelist(address).details: getter to determine if address is in whitelist
